subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Portland Trail Blazers removed the interim tag from General Manager Steve Patterson’s title yesterday. Patterson also has been the team president since 2003. He will do both jobs “for the foreseeable future,” according to the team’s Web site. Patterson, who could not be reached for comment, took over after John Nash was fired in late May.
